name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Network Fundamentals

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Ne: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Network Fundamentals The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Network Fundamentals is designed to offer students the opportunity of a specialized study to provide students with experience in key courses of this discipline at the undergraduate level. This CUGS prepares students to sit for the following certification exams: CompTIA+ CompTIA Network+
Program Requirements: Program Requirements The Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Network Fundamentals consists of 12 s.h. Students seeking this CUGS are required to successfully complete (grade of D- or better) the four courses in the order listed below:

courses.subject: CST
courses.title: Introduction to Computer Networks and Data Communications

notes: Total Required Credits for the Program: Mike Chu Advisor Robinson Hall 328K 856.256.4805 chum@rowan.edu
